dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5400 IH: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Defense to annually review the amount of financial assistance for child care and youth program services providers provided by the Secretary.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Khanna introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Defense to annually review the amount of financial assistance for child care and youth program services providers provided by the Secretary.

section.header: Annual review of financial assistance limits for child care and youth program services providers
section.text: Section 1798 of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Annual review of amount of assistance
subsection.text: The Secretary shall annually review the amount of financial assistance provided under this section, including the maximum amount of financial assistance per month per child that the Secretary authorizes to be provided to eligible providers under this section.
